name: Gh-pages-template
tagline: free hosting on github! fork this to get a repo with only a gh-pages branch that is easy to edit
body:
### Adel Amer Bibi.


I am an MSc/PhD student at KAUST "King Abdullah University For Science And Technology located on the Red Sea in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia
in the Visual Computing Center advised by Professor Bernard Ghanem. I'm interested in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, and Optimization.
Specifically, I'm interested in RGB/RGBD trackers, Circulant Structure Matrices for Tracking, Correlation Filters, Stereo based trackers,
Underwater Color Correction, and Sparse Representation.
I received my Bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering from Kuwait University in July 2014.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
